title: What every happened to that car at the airport that had at least 4 doors on each side? Was it also used in an episode of \'Dawson\'s Creek?\'
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100802/ARTICLES/100809957/1020/news0103?Title=MyReporter-tracks-down-the-car-with-eight-doors
